Home → Help using the service → Re–registering an expired library card

Re–registering an expired library card

Your library card membership expires automatically after 3 years. This helps us keep our data up to date.

You won’t be able to use our services when this happens.

Renewing your library card

Library card number (with no spaces)

Date of birth

We can send you a monthly email with our latest books, films, DVDs and music. We don't share your email with anyone else and you can unsubscribe at any time.

Alternatively, you can:

  • call customer service on 01473 263838
  • take your library card to any library in Suffolk
You won’t need to apply for a new library card to re–register. If you are new to Suffolk Libraries, you can apply for a new library card.

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
